rationale: The segment describes actions taken ('have completed an initial round of surveillance testing') which is a capability/preparedness measure, without explicit calming keywords.
statement_text: Poultry farms with a 10-kilometer (6.2-miles) control area around the infected Dubois County farm have completed an initial round of surveillance testing for highly pathogenic avian influenza, and all of the tests were negative, the Indiana State Board of Animal Health said.
